name: The Hungry House
description:
WARNING: This visual novel contains sexual and violent subject matter.

6,000-word kinetic visual novel with a single branching choice.

April our plucky hero has one of those days that just kind of sucks. One bad event after the other, leading to finally being kidnapped by one of her clients. What ensues is our story of discovery, escape, and some old fashion revenge. The story is inspired by the horror movies of the '70s, gothic horror, and leans heavily toward the gritty horror experience.

The game is complete and has been fully edited, says the editor.

PS let me know what you think or if you run into any issues in the comments below. Thanks a bunch for playing.
